'''2.2.7265''' ({{w|Microsoft Windows|Windows}}), '''2.2.7264''' ({{w|Microsoft Windows|Windows}}, via the {{w|Microsoft Store}}/{{W|Xbox (app)|Xbox app}}), '''2.2.7268''' ({{w|macOS}}), or '''2.2.7266''' ({{w|Linux}}), is an update to the [[Minecraft Launcher|launcher]] released on November 2, 2021.

This version was the first released to the Windows Store and merged the three PC entries of the ''Minecraft'' franchise: ''Java'' and Bedrock editions and ''[[Minecraft Dungeons]]''.

== Additions ==
* {{BE}} now in the Launcher.
* {{el|MCD}} from Microsoft Store now in the Launcher.
* Xbox Game Pass for PC subscribers who are on a Windows 10 or Windows 11 device and are using the new Launcher from the Microsoft Store/Xbox app can now play {{JE}}, {{BE}} and {{el|MCD}} under Game Pass.

== Changes ==
* Updated how accounts work in the Launcher.

== Fixes ==
* Fixed a bunch of UI bugs.
* Fixes to the way the Launcher interacts with users' entitlements to various games, especially in relation to if the user is a Game Pass subscriber.</onlyinclude>
